header.topTitle: Looking for custom plans and pricing? Get a preview of our PPC packages
header.subtitle: You can choose a PPC management package that suits your business’ needs  and fits within your marketing budget. When you decide to partner with  WebFX, we’ll work closely with you to create a custom PPC campaign to  help you achieve your business goals.

pricingDetails.title: Your Ad Spend
pricingDetails.description: Your advertising budget will determine monthly management costs and recommended channels.

pricingDetails.title: Networks & Targeting
pricingDetails.description: Strategies depend on where you advertise — Google, Bing, Programmatic, etc.

pricingDetails.title: Creative Support
pricingDetails.description: Professional display ads designed by our team if needed.

includedItems: In-depth keyword research and advanced selection
Ongoing ad strategy management and optimization
